write_xml_primitives.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! write_xml_prims.f90 - Write routines for primitive data
00002 !
00003 ! $Id: write_xml_prims.f90,v 1.2 2007/12/27 05:13:59 arjenmarkus Exp $
00004 !
00005 ! Arjen Markus
00006 !
00007 ! General information:
00008 ! This module is part of the XML-Fortran library. Its
00009 ! purpose is to write individual items to an XML
00010 ! file using the right tag. It is used by the code generated
00011 ! by the make_xml_reader program.
00012 !
00013 module write_xml_primitives
00014     use xmlparse
00015     implicit none
00016 
00017 !   interface write_to_xml
00018 !       module procedure write_to_xml_integers
00019 !       module procedure write_to_xml_reals
00020 !       module procedure write_to_xml_doubles
00021 !       module procedure write_to_xml_logicals
00022 !       module procedure write_to_xml_words
00023 !   end interface
00024     interface write_to_xml_word
00025        module procedure write_to_xml_string
00026     end interface
00027     interface write_to_xml_line
00028        module procedure write_to_xml_string
00029     end interface
00030 
00031 contains
00032 
00033 ! write_to_xml_integer --
00034 !    Routine to write a single integer to the XML file
00035 !
00036 ! Arguments:
00037 !    info        XML parser structure
00038 !    tag         The tag in question
00039 !    indent      Number of spaces for indentation
00040 !    value       Value to be written
00041 !
00042 subroutine write_to_xml_integer( info, tag, indent, value )
00043     type(XML_PARSE), intent(in)                  :: info
00044     character(len=*), intent(in)                 :: tag
00045     integer, intent(in)                          :: indent
00046     integer, intent(in)                          :: value
00047 
00048     character(len=100)                           :: indentation
00049 
00050     indentation = ' '
00051     write( info%lun, '(4a,i0,3a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00052         '<', trim(tag), '>', value, '</', trim(tag), '>'
00053 
00054 end subroutine write_to_xml_integer
00055 
00056 ! write_to_xml_integer_1dim --
00057 !    Routine to write an array of integers to the XML file
00058 !
00059 ! Arguments:
00060 !    info        XML parser structure
00061 !    tag         The tag in question
00062 !    indent      Number of spaces for indentation
00063 !    values      Values to be written
00064 !
00065 subroutine write_to_xml_integer_1dim( info, tag, indent, values )
00066     type(XML_PARSE), intent(in)                  :: info
00067     character(len=*), intent(in)                 :: tag
00068     integer, intent(in)                          :: indent
00069     integer, dimension(:), intent(in)            :: values
00070 
00071     integer                                      :: i
00072 
00073     do i = 1,size(values)
00074         call write_to_xml_integer( info, tag, indent, values(i) )
00075     enddo
00076 
00077 end subroutine write_to_xml_integer_1dim
00078 
00079 ! write_to_xml_real --
00080 !    Routine to write a single real value (single precision) to the XML file
00081 !
00082 ! Arguments:
00083 !    info        XML parser structure
00084 !    tag         The tag in question
00085 !    indent      Number of spaces for indentation
00086 !    value       Value to be written
00087 !
00088 subroutine write_to_xml_real( info, tag, indent, value )
00089     type(XML_PARSE), intent(in)                  :: info
00090     character(len=*), intent(in)                 :: tag
00091     integer, intent(in)                          :: indent
00092     real, intent(in)                             :: value
00093 
00094     character(len=100)                           :: indentation
00095     character(len=12)                            :: buffer
00096 
00097     indentation = ' '
00098     write( buffer, '(1pg12.4)' ) value
00099     write( info%lun, '(8a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00100         '<', trim(tag), '>', trim(adjustl(buffer)), '</', trim(tag), '>'
00101 
00102 end subroutine write_to_xml_real
00103 
00104 ! write_to_xml_real_1dim --
00105 !    Routine to write an array of reals to the XML file
00106 !
00107 ! Arguments:
00108 !    info        XML parser structure
00109 !    tag         The tag in question
00110 !    indent      Number of spaces for indentation
00111 !    values      Values to be written
00112 !
00113 subroutine write_to_xml_real_1dim( info, tag, indent, values )
00114     type(XML_PARSE), intent(in)                  :: info
00115     character(len=*), intent(in)                 :: tag
00116     integer, intent(in)                          :: indent
00117     real, dimension(:), intent(in)               :: values
00118 
00119     integer                                      :: i
00120 
00121     do i = 1,size(values)
00122         call write_to_xml_real( info, tag, indent, values(i) )
00123     enddo
00124 
00125 end subroutine write_to_xml_real_1dim

00127 ! write_to_xml_double --
00128 !    Routine to write one real value (double precision) to the XML file
00129 !
00130 ! Arguments:
00131 !    info        XML parser structure
00132 !    tag         The tag in question
00133 !    indent      Number of spaces for indentation
00134 !    value       Value to be written
00135 !
00136 subroutine write_to_xml_double( info, tag, indent, value )
00137     type(XML_PARSE), intent(in)                  :: info
00138     character(len=*), intent(in)                 :: tag
00139     integer, intent(in)                          :: indent
00140     real(kind=kind(1.0d0)), intent(in)           :: value
00141 
00142     character(len=100)                           :: indentation
00143     character(len=16)                            :: buffer
00144 
00145     indentation = ' '
00146     write( buffer, '(1pg16.7)' ) value
00147     write( info%lun, '(8a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00148         '<', trim(tag), '>', trim(adjustl(buffer)), '</', trim(tag), '>'
00149 
00150 end subroutine write_to_xml_double
00151

00156 !    info        XML parser structure

00163     character(len=*), intent(in)                 :: tag
00164     integer, intent(in)                          :: indent
00165     real(kind=kind(1.0d00)), dimension(:), intent(in) :: values
00166 
00167     integer                                      :: i
00168 
00169     do i = 1,size(values)
00170         call write_to_xml_double( info, tag, indent, values(i) )
00171     enddo

00173 end subroutine write_to_xml_double_1dim

00175 ! write_to_xml_string --
00176 !    Routine to write one string to the XML file
00177 !
00178 ! Arguments:
00179 !    info        XML parser structure
00180 !    tag         The tag in question
00181 !    indent      Number of spaces for indentation
00182 !    value       Value to be written
00183 !
00184 subroutine write_to_xml_string( info, tag, indent, value )
00185     type(XML_PARSE), intent(in)                  :: info
00186     character(len=*), intent(in)                 :: tag
00187     integer, intent(in)                          :: indent
00188     character(len=*), intent(in)                 :: value
00189 
00190     character(len=100)                           :: indentation
00191 
00192     !
00193     ! NOTE: No guards against <, >, & and " yet!
00194     ! NOTE: difference needed between words and lines?
00195     !
00196     indentation = ' '
00197     write( info%lun, '(8a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00198         '<', trim(tag), '>', trim(value), '</', trim(tag), '>'
00199 
00200 end subroutine write_to_xml_string
00201

00214     integer, intent(in)                          :: indent

00216 
00217     integer                                      :: i
00218 
00219     do i = 1,size(values)

00221     enddo

00247 ! write_to_xml_logical --
00248 !    Routine to write one logical to the XML file
00249 !
00250 ! Arguments:
00251 !    info        XML parser structure
00252 !    tag         The tag in question
00253 !    indent      Number of spaces for indentation
00254 !    value       Value to be written
00255 !
00256 subroutine write_to_xml_logical( info, tag, indent, value )
00257     type(XML_PARSE), intent(in)                  :: info
00258     character(len=*), intent(in)                 :: tag
00259     integer, intent(in)                          :: indent
00260     logical, intent(in)                          :: value
00261 
00262     character(len=100)                           :: indentation
00263 
00264     indentation = ' '
00265     if ( value ) then
00266         write( info%lun, '(8a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00267             '<', trim(tag), '>true</', trim(tag), '>'
00268     else
00269         write( info%lun, '(8a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00270             '<', trim(tag), '>false</', trim(tag), '>'
00271     endif
00272 
00273 end subroutine write_to_xml_logical
00274 
00275 ! write_to_xml_logical_1dim --
00276 !    Routine to write an array of logicals to the XML file
00277 !
00278 ! Arguments:
00279 !    info        XML parser structure
00280 !    tag         The tag in question
00281 !    indent      Number of spaces for indentation
00282 !    values      Values to be written
00283 !
00284 subroutine write_to_xml_logical_1dim( info, tag, indent, values )
00285     type(XML_PARSE), intent(in)                  :: info
00286     character(len=*), intent(in)                 :: tag
00287     integer, intent(in)                          :: indent
00288     logical, dimension(:), intent(in)            :: values
00289 
00290     integer                                      :: i
00291 
00292     do i = 1,size(values)
00293         call write_to_xml_logical( info, tag, indent, values(i) )
00294     enddo
00295 
00296 end subroutine write_to_xml_logical_1dim

00298 ! write_to_xml_integer_array --
00299 !    Routine to write an array of integers to the XML file
00300 !
00301 ! Arguments:
00302 !    info        XML parser structure
00303 !    tag         The tag in question
00304 !    indent      Number of spaces for indentation
00305 !    array       Values to be written
00306 !
00307 subroutine write_to_xml_integer_array( info, tag, indent, array )
00308     type(XML_PARSE), intent(in)                  :: info
00309     character(len=*), intent(in)                 :: tag
00310     integer, intent(in)                          :: indent
00311     integer, dimension(:), intent(in)            :: array
00312 
00313     character(len=100)                           :: indentation
00314     integer                                      :: i, i2, j
00315 
00316     indentation = ' '
00317 
00318     write( info%lun, '(4a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00319         '<', trim(tag), '>'
00320     do i = 1,size(array),10
00321         i2 = min( i + 9, size(array) )
00322         write( info%lun, '(a,10i12)' ) indentation(1:min(indent+4,100)), &
00323             ( array(j) ,j = i,i2 )
00324     enddo
00325     write( info%lun, '(4a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00326         '</', trim(tag), '>'
00327 
00328 end subroutine write_to_xml_integer_array
00329 
00330 ! write_to_xml_real_array --
00331 !    Routine to write an array of single precision reals to the XML file
00332 !
00333 ! Arguments:
00334 !    info        XML parser structure
00335 !    tag         The tag in question
00336 !    indent      Number of spaces for indentation
00337 !    array       Values to be written
00338 !
00339 subroutine write_to_xml_real_array( info, tag, indent, array )
00340     type(XML_PARSE), intent(in)                  :: info
00341     character(len=*), intent(in)                 :: tag
00342     integer, intent(in)                          :: indent
00343     real, dimension(:), intent(in)               :: array
00344 
00345     character(len=100)                           :: indentation
00346     integer                                      :: i, i2, j
00347 
00348     indentation = ' '
00349 
00350     write( info%lun, '(4a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00351         '<', trim(tag), '>'
00352     do i = 1,size(array),10
00353         i2 = min( i + 9, size(array) )
00354         write( info%lun, '(a,10g12.4)' ) indentation(1:min(indent+4,100)), &
00355             ( array(j) ,j = i,i2 )
00356     enddo
00357     write( info%lun, '(4a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00358         '</', trim(tag), '>'
00359 
00360 end subroutine write_to_xml_real_array

00362 ! write_to_xml_double_array --
00363 !    Routine to write an array of double precision reals to the XML file
00364 !
00365 ! Arguments:
00366 !    info        XML parser structure
00367 !    tag         The tag in question
00368 !    indent      Number of spaces for indentation
00369 !    array       Values to be written
00370 !
00371 subroutine write_to_xml_double_array( info, tag, indent, array )
00372     type(XML_PARSE), intent(in)                  :: info
00373     character(len=*), intent(in)                 :: tag
00374     integer, intent(in)                          :: indent
00375     real(kind=kind(1.0d0)), dimension(:), intent(in) :: array
00376 
00377     character(len=100)                           :: indentation
00378     integer                                      :: i, i2, j
00379 
00380     indentation = ' '
00381 
00382     write( info%lun, '(4a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00383         '<', trim(tag), '>'
00384     do i = 1,size(array),5
00385         i2 = min( i + 4, size(array) )
00386         write( info%lun, '(a,5g20.7)' ) indentation(1:min(indent+4,100)), &
00387             ( array(j) ,j = i,i2 )
00388     enddo
00389     write( info%lun, '(4a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00390         '</', trim(tag), '>'
00391 
00392 end subroutine write_to_xml_double_array

00394 ! write_to_xml_logical_array --
00395 !    Routine to write an array of logicals to the XML file
00396 !
00397 ! Arguments:
00398 !    info        XML parser structure
00399 !    tag         The tag in question
00400 !    indent      Number of spaces for indentation
00401 !    array       Values to be written
00402 !
00403 subroutine write_to_xml_logical_array( info, tag, indent, array )
00404     type(XML_PARSE), intent(in)                  :: info
00405     character(len=*), intent(in)                 :: tag
00406     integer, intent(in)                          :: indent
00407     logical, dimension(:), intent(in)            :: array
00408 
00409     character(len=100)                           :: indentation
00410     integer                                      :: i, i2, j
00411 
00412     indentation = ' '
00413 
00414     write( info%lun, '(4a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00415         '<', trim(tag), '>'
00416     do i = 1,size(array),10
00417         i2 = min( i + 9, size(array) )
00418         write( info%lun, '(a,10a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent+4,100)), &
00419             ( merge('true  ', 'false ', array(j)) ,j = i,i2 )
00420     enddo
00421     write( info%lun, '(4a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00422         '</', trim(tag), '>'
00423 
00424 end subroutine write_to_xml_logical_array
00425 
00426 ! write_to_xml_word_array --
00427 !    Routine to write an array of words to the XML file
00428 !
00429 ! Arguments:
00430 !    info        XML parser structure
00431 !    tag         The tag in question
00432 !    indent      Number of spaces for indentation
00433 !    array       Values to be written
00434 !
00435 subroutine write_to_xml_word_array( info, tag, indent, array )
00436     type(XML_PARSE), intent(in)                  :: info
00437     character(len=*), intent(in)                 :: tag
00438     integer, intent(in)                          :: indent
00439     character(len=*), dimension(:), intent(in)   :: array
00440 
00441     character(len=100)                           :: indentation
00442     integer                                      :: i, i2, j
00443 
00444     indentation = ' '
00445 
00446     write( info%lun, '(4a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00447         '<', trim(tag), '>'
00448     do i = 1,size(array),10
00449         i2 = min( i + 9, size(array) )
00450         write( info%lun, '(a,20a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent+4,100)), &
00451             ( trim(array(j)) , ' ' ,j = i,i2 )
00452     enddo
00453     write( info%lun, '(4a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00454         '</', trim(tag), '>'
00455 
00456 end subroutine write_to_xml_word_array
00457 
00458 ! write_to_xml_line_array --
00459 !    Routine to write an array of lines to the XML file
00460 !
00461 ! Arguments:
00462 !    info        XML parser structure
00463 !    tag         The tag in question
00464 !    indent      Number of spaces for indentation
00465 !    array       Values to be written
00466 !
00467 subroutine write_to_xml_line_array( info, tag, indent, array )
00468     type(XML_PARSE), intent(in)                  :: info
00469     character(len=*), intent(in)                 :: tag
00470     integer, intent(in)                          :: indent
00471     logical, dimension(:), intent(in)            :: array
00472 
00473     character(len=100)                           :: indentation
00474     integer                                      :: i
00475 
00476     indentation = ' '
00477 
00478     write( info%lun, '(4a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00479         '<', trim(tag), '>'
00480     do i = 1,size(array)
00481         write( info%lun, '(a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent+4,100)), &
00482             array(i)
00483     enddo
00484     write( info%lun, '(4a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00485         '</', trim(tag), '>'
00486 
00487 end subroutine write_to_xml_line_array
